item.description:
Bringing it to the Back Bay - this is an upscale venue, especially for a Friday night. If we get there before 9, there shouldn't be a cover, plus it's less crowded.

Afterwards, we will head out to Rumor, which is one of the best clubbing venues in the city. We will leave Whiskey Park at around 10:30pm, so if you plan on joining us, really try to meet us at Whiskey! You will probably not be able to find us inside Rumor.

Meeting details: Once you get inside Whiskey, turn immediately LEFT, and go into the lounge area. It's not very large, so you should be able to find the group. My picture is on this site (6ft tall Asian guy shouldn't be too hard to find), PLUS I'll even wear my scarf to be completely conspicuous. If your picture is up on the site, do RVSP and I'll look for you as well. My phone is 646.541.0708.

See you there! Charlie

For more information, see http://boston.citysea...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Friday @ Whiskey Park 8pm
